name: NCube
tagline: Strategic partner for technology team augmentation
description:
NCube helps clients accelerate product development by providing remote software development teams. 
We have access to a pool of exceptional talents and are able to source rare experts with the knowledge of cutting edge technologies. Our goal is to provide the technology team you would work with for years to come.
Operating since 2008, we have nurtured stable, long-term technology engagements with companies from US and Europe. NCube, founded in the UK, has a core R&D office in downtown Kyiv, Ukraine.
Industry focus:
FinTech & Banking
eCommerce
Marketing Automation
Healthcare
Travel
Platform focus:
SaaS/PaaS
Mobile
Web
Professionals available:
Web & Mobile developers
Enterprise platforms
